headline: Show HN: A modular Python TUI framework with a fast and pretty markup language
description:
PyTermGUI is a highly modular framework offering most of the features one would expect from a GUI library, such as a mature and open Widget API, animations, mouse support and other goodies, right inside the terminal!

The markup language is another great feature of the library, and is used by practically all elements of it. It is based on Rich's implementation, but uses a more concise and easier to humanly parse syntax, while being over 10 times faster at parsing due to a long list of optimizations.

There is a full Window Manager API included as well, allowing the user to move, resize and otherwise manipulate windows and inner contents using either their mouse of keyboard.

All of the "guts" of the library are also exposed and usable from the outside within the `ansi_interface` submodule.

Thank you for your time, and I hope the library may be of some use!
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 一个模块化的Python TUI框架，具有快速和漂亮的标记语言
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 一個模塊化的Python TUI框架，具有快速和漂亮的標記語言
description_zh-Hans:
PyTermGUI是一个高度模块化的框架，它提供了人们对GUI库所期望的大部分功能，如成熟和开放的Widget API、动画、鼠标支持和其他好东西，就在终端内！

标记语言是该库的另一个伟大的功能，实际上它的所有元素都在使用。它基于Rich的实现，但使用了更简洁、更容易被人类解析的语法，同时由于一长串的优化，解析速度提高了10倍以上。

还包括一个完整的窗口管理器API，允许用户使用鼠标或键盘来移动、调整大小和以其他方式操纵窗口和内部内容。

该库的所有 "内脏 "也都在 "ansi_interface "子模块中从外部公开并使用。

感谢您的时间，我希望该库能有一些用处。

還包括一個完整的窗口管理器API，允許用戶使用鼠標或鍵盤來移動、調整大小和以其他方式操縱窗口和內部內容。

該庫的所有 "內臟 "也都在 "ansi_interface "子模塊中從外部公開並使用。

感謝您的時間，我希望該庫能有一些用處。
